charges.description: WHILE OFF-DUTY, DID CONSUME AN INTOXICANT TO THE EXTENT THAT HE WAS UNFIT FOR DUTY.
charges.penalty: COUNSELING, DISMISSAL PROBATION (12 month(s) ), ORDERED BREATH TESTING, PRE-TRIAL SUSPENSION DAYS (30 day(s) )

charges.description: WHILE OFF-DUTY, FAILED TO PROMPTLY MAKE PROPER NOTIFICATIONS TO THE DEPARTMENTREGARDING HIS ARREST.
charges.penalty: COUNSELING, DISMISSAL PROBATION (12 month(s) ), ORDERED BREATH TESTING, PRE-TRIAL SUSPENSION DAYS (30 day(s) )

charges.description: WHILE ON DUTY, DID FAIL TO MAKE PROPER MEMO-BOOK ENTRIES IN HIS DEPARTMENT ISSUED MEMO-BOOK, AS REQUIRED.

WHILE ON-DUTY, FAILED TO FOLLOW PROPER DARP PROCEDURE BY ALLOWING A NON-DARP TOW TRUCK COMPANY TO REMOVE A VEHICLE FROM THE SCENE OF A VEHICLE ACCIDENT AND FAILING TO GIVE A PROPER RADIO DISPOSITION TO THE COMMUNICATIONS SECTION.
KNOWINGLY ASSOCIATED WITH A PERSON OR ORGANIZATION REASONABLY BELIEVED TO BE ENGAGED IN CRIMINAL ACTIVITIES.
WRONGFULLY UTILIZED DEPARTMENT COMPUTER ON ONE (1) OCCASION TO MAKE AN INQUIRY UNRELATED TO THE OFFICIAL BUSINESS OF THE DEPARTMENT.

charges.description: ON DUTY, WRONGFULLY USED FORCE IN THAT HE STRUCK A PERSON KNOWN TO THE DEPARTMENT WITHOUT POLICE NECESSITY.
ON DUTY,  INTENTIONALLY TIGHTENED THE HANDCUFFS ON THE WRISTS OF A PERSON KNOWN TO THE DEPARTMENT WHICH RESULTED IN LACERATIONS TO HIS WRISTS.
WHILE ON-DUTY, DID FAIL AND NEGLECT TO PROPERLY SAFEGUARD A PRISONER, RESULTING IN THE LOSS OF SAID PRISONER
WHILE ON-DUTY,  DID FAIL TO REPORT IMMEDIATELY TO THE PATROL SUPERVISOR AND THE PLATOON COMMANDER THAT A PRISONER HAD ESCAPED
WRONGFULLY AND KNOWINGLY ASSOCIATED WITH A PERSON REASONABLY BELIEVED TO BE ENGAGED IN, LIKELY TO ENGAGE IN, OR TO HAVE ENGAGED IN CRIMINAL ACTIVITIES
ENGAGED IN A PHYSICAL ALTERCATION WITH AN INDIVIDUAL KNOWN TO THE DEPARTMENT.

WHILE OFF-DUTY  ENGAGED IN CONDUCT PREJUDICIAL TO THE GOOD ORDER, EFFICIENCY, OR DISCIPLINE OF THE DEPARTMENT, TO WIT: SAID POLICE OFFICER FAILED TO TAKE POLICE ACTION HAVING BEEN INVOLVED IN A PHYSICAL ALTERCATION WHERE INDIVIDUALS SUSTAINED INJURIES REQUIRING MEDICAL ATTENTION.

charges.description: WHILE OFF-DUTY, OPERATED A MOTOR VEHICLE WHILE UNDER THE INFLENCE OF AN INTOXICANT.
charges.penalty: COUNSELING, DISMISSAL PROBATION (12 month(s) ), ORDERED BREATH TESTING, PRE-TRIAL SUSPENSION DAYS (30 day(s) ), SUSPENDED W/O PAY (20 day(s) ), VACATION DAYS (10 day(s) )

charges.description: OPERATED A MOTOR VEHICLE WHILE HIS ABILITY WAS IMPAIRED BY AN INTOXICANT.
charges.penalty: COUNSELING, DISMISSAL PROBATION (12 month(s) ), ORDERED BREATH TESTING, PRE-TRIAL SUSPENSION DAYS (30 day(s) ), SUSPENDED W/O PAY (20 day(s) ), VACATION DAYS (10 day(s) )

charges.description: REFUSED TO SUBMIT TO A CHEMICAL BREATH TEST.
charges.penalty: COUNSELING, DISMISSAL PROBATION (12 month(s) ), ORDERED BREATH TESTING, PRE-TRIAL SUSPENSION DAYS (30 day(s) ), SUSPENDED W/O PAY (20 day(s) ), VACATION DAYS (10 day(s) )

charges.description: CONSUMED AN INTOXICANT TO THE EXTENT THAT SAID POLICE OFFICER WAS UNFIT FOR DUTY.
charges.penalty: COUNSELING, DISMISSAL PROBATION (12 month(s) ), ORDERED BREATH TESTING, PRE-TRIAL SUSPENSION DAYS (30 day(s) ), SUSPENDED W/O PAY (20 day(s) ), VACATION DAYS (10 day(s) )

charges.description: WHILE OPERATING A MOTOR VEHICLE UNDER THE INFLUENCE OF AN INTOXICANT, STRUCK/HIT TWO PEDESTRIANS.
charges.penalty: COUNSELING, DISMISSAL PROBATION (12 month(s) ), ORDERED BREATH TESTING, PRE-TRIAL SUSPENSION DAYS (30 day(s) ), SUSPENDED W/O PAY (20 day(s) ), VACATION DAYS (10 day(s) )

charges.description: WHILE OFF-DUTY, FAILED AND NEGLECTED TO REMAIN AT THE SCENE, OF AN UNUSAL POLICE OCCURRENCE.

charges.description: WRONGFULLY DAMAGED PROPERTY BELONGING TO A PERSON KNOWN TO THE DEPARTMENT.
WHILE OFF-DUTY, DID CONSUME AN INTOXICANT TO THE EXTENT THAT HE WAS UNFIT FOR DUTY.
WRONGFULLY FAILED TO NOTIFY HIS COMMANDING OFFICER TAT HE WAS PERMANENTLY RESIDING AT A LOCATION WITHIN THE 30 PRECINCT WHERE HE WAS ASSIGNED.
WRONGFULLY FAILED TO PROVIDE THE DEPARTMENT WITH ACCURATE AND CURRENT PERSONAL INFORMATION, TO WIT: THE ADDRESS OF HIS RESIDENCE.
FAILED TO PROVIDE HIS NAME AND SHIELD NUMBER UPON REQUEST.
FAILED TO MAKE ADEQUATE ENTRIES IN ACTIVITY LOG.
FAILED TO PREPARE ONE OR MORE STOP, QUESTION AND FRISK REPORT WORKSHEETS.

charges.description: WAS WRONGFULLY AND WITHOUT JUST CAUSE ABSENT FROM SAID OFFICER'S RESIDENCE WITHOUT PERMISSION OF SAID OFFICER'S DISTRICT SURGEON AND/OR THE MEDICAL DIVISION SICK DESK SUPERVISOR.
WRONGFULLY AND WITHOUT JUST CAUSE LEFT THE CONFINES OF NEW YORK CITY AND ITS RESIDENCE COUNTIES WITHOUT APPROVAL OF THE CHIEF OF PERSONNEL.
WHILE OFF-DUTY, DID ENGAGE IN A PHYSICAL ALTERCATION WITH A PERSON KNOWN TO THE DEPARTMENT.
charges.penalty: COUNSELING, DISMISSAL PROBATION (12 month(s) ), PRE-TRIAL SUSPENSION DAYS (34 day(s) )

charges.description: WITHOUT  PERMISSION FROM THE DEPARTMENT,  TESTIFIED IN A CRIMINAL PROCEEDING BEFORE THE SUPERIOR COURT OF NEW JERSEY, ESSEX COUNTY
